about_us_description: Machi is an AI podcast app that allows human to AI interactions and AI to human interactions by voice or chat. With Machi, users can generate images and read text using advanced AI technology. We provide a platform where users can enjoy intelligent conversations with our AI technology in a natural and seamless way. Our app offers group chat features, allowing users to engage in meaningful discussions and share ideas with their friends.
send_your_message_to_our_email_address: Send your message to our e-mail address:
onboarding_step1: Prepare for a LOL escapade with machi
onboarding_step2: Engage in witty banter with bots that rival a stand-up comedian
onboarding_step3: Create or scroll thru epic stories and comics that would leave Shakespeare and Superman in awe

sign_up_step_2_title: let's create a profile picture using prompts
sign_up_step_2_direction: You can describe yourself, your pet, your favorite vacay spot. Be specific.
sign_up_profile_ai_prompt_hint: girl with brown hair with black aviator glasses, close up
sign_up_profile_generate_once: You can generate only this once but you can change the photo later.
i_agree_with: By signing in you agree with
deactivate_info: Your profile and content will not be visible. Your profile will be reactivated onced you sign back in.
photo_will_be_deleted: Photo will be deleted, and this action cannot be reversed!
conversation_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete? This will delete all images and cannot be recoverd.
conversation_delete_error: An error occurred deleting the messages
subscribe_how_to: Generative AI images utilize libraries from open journey, stable diffusion, dall-e.
subscribe_curent_libraries: To use the different libraries type your prompt follow by the model name:

subscribed_credits_expired_footnote: Use your credits before end of expiration or your credits will be lost.
please_install_it_now: Please install it now and enjoy the new features.
don_worry_your_data_will_not_be_lost: Don't worry, your data will not be lost!
please_contact_support_to_active_it: Please contact support to active it.
all_your_profile_data_will_be_permanentl:
All your Profile Data will be permanently deleted and this action cannot be reversed!

Note: You can hide your profile from Settings, instead deleting it!
only_13_years_old_and_above_are_allowed_: Only 13 years old and above are allowed to create an account!
protected_profile_notes: You can still post, comment but your profile will be limited to view by others.

bot_test_warning: By publishing you agree to abide to the Terms and Condition.
select_interest: Let's find some topics that may interest you

comment_delete: Are you are you want to delete the reply?
story_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this module? All images will be deleted
story_delete_error: Something went wrong deleting the story
story_layout_comic_note: Background image may not be aligned in preview.
creative_mix_quickly_create_story_info: Get a story and create your own images
creative_mix_manual_info: Create an empty collection with title

creative_mix_header_machi_create: Ask a question. Machi decides the drawing

creative_mix_instruction:
How to: When chatting, click on the board icon located beneath the messages to save the message. 

Within the boards, you have the flexibility to edit the messages, allowing you to create content or make any necessary modifications for future private reference.
creative_mix_are_you_sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this board? All text and images will be deleted
creative_mix_board_error: Something went wrong deleting the board
creative_mix_ai_image_credits: This will use 3 credits each time.
creative_mix_quick_description: Tell me briefly what content you want to create
creative_mix_quick_sub_desc: You can say fictional or non-fictional (educational) content.
creative_mix_quick_hint: If super mario became superman or how does the cytoplasm work
creative_mix_turn_machine_on: Looks like the machine is not turned on. Come back in 2 minutes.
plans_include_gpt: Free and paid plans include ChatGPT 3.5
post_interactive_info: Create an interactive post where users decide the outcome. You can create any content that follows guidelines, including stories and exams. You will only need to write the initial prompt, be very specific.
post_interactive_hint:
Example: Imagine you wake up in a mysterious world, surrounded by enchanted forests and magnical creatures. As you take your first step, you notice a glowing object in the distance. What do you do next? 

You have a microbiology exam coming up and need questions.
post_interactive_hidden_hint:
(optional) Secret text - This is not displayed but will take part of the path. 

This is where you'll surprise your readers!
interactive_mode_action_info: Questions are generated dynamically based on creator's prompt. The questions and responses are not saved unless you continue in the chat.
